overview: He possesses a BSc and MSc in Computer Systems and Technology, as well as an MSc in Advanced Computer Science with ICT Management from Manchester University. His career began at ‘Microsoft’ as a consultant. He has since conducted numerous roles relevant to his position in Swogo, such as working as an IT Consultant for Webpowered Limited, a Software Development Consultant for financial services firm Begbies Traynor Group, and most recently as an Agile Process Manager at Bet Genius.
